ud2.8:1.2: kuṇḍikāyaṃ → kuṇḍiyāyaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | kuṇḍadhānavane → kuṇḍiṭṭhānavane (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ud2.8:5.4: saha vacanā ca pana → saha vacanā pana (pts-vp-pli1); saha vacanā (?)
ud2.8:9.8: pacchā tvaṃ karissasī’ti → pacchā so karissati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); karissasīti saññāpehi (mr)
ud2.8:11.3: Dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ → dvinnaṃ kho tesaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); dvinnaṃ kho nesaṃ (mr)
